item.description:
Agenda

11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation by Ceri Ruenheck, Cold Calling Made Simple

Hear how you can be proactive, when marketing your business, by reaching out to your prospects via the telephone.  Learn what to say and how to say it when making Cold Calls, and learn what to do after the call is made.  Plus you'll hear the answer to the most frequently asked questions that Ceri receives, along with the opportunity to ask your own.   

"After attending this seminar myself, I highly recommend it -- well worth the time and money investment! Ceri's expertise shines through -- she helps allay many fears and shares multiple tips and resources for successful cold calling."  CV, Priority Wellness

 

About Ceri:

Ceri Ruenheck is the owner of It's Your Call (www.itsyourcall.com) a business to business telemarketing firm that helps small businesses make the necessary outbound calls that they might not have the resources to perform themselves. She recently opened a second business with her husband called Two Cool Cats (http://www.twocoolcats.com). In addition to running those businesses, Ceri is a noted speaker, co-host of the local cable TV show, "Stay Connected" and author of the book,Cold Calling for the Clueless(www.coldcallingfortheclueless.com).  Ceri lives with her husband, two boys and two cats in Harvard , MA .

1:15  - 1:30 - Networking and Wrap up

 

There will be a table available for business cards and promotional materials.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
